column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022. Dibrugarh East - Kachari Line at Nagaghoolie Village | As per reports received from Water Resource Deptt rapid erosion seen in bank of River Brahmaputra from last 3 days. About 500m areas in length has been afftected as reported on 08-09-2022. Visited field alongwith Lot-Mondol and found no any houses situated near the bank of the river. GPS Co-Ordinate - 27.31'26.90"N 95.0'21.80"E to 27.31'18.73"N 95.0'5.42"E | 0
